name: get_ip_address
description: Retrieve the public IP address of this machine as seen from the internet. This shows your external/WAN IP address that websites and external services see when you connect to them.

ip_version.description: IP version to retrieve. Options: 'ipv4' (default), 'ipv6', 'both'. Most services use IPv4.

include_details.description: Whether to include additional information like ISP, location, etc. Default: false (only returns IP address).
